function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in risk predictions due to limited training data and unknown spatial differences in treatment seeking rates.","Impact":"Inaccurate risk predictions and inability to identify true hotspots of transmission.","Mitigation":"Collect more comprehensive training data and investigate spatial differences in treatment seeking rates to improve risk predictions.","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis technologies.","People":"Research institutions, public health authorities.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Lack of information on receptivity to imported cases due to outdated prevalence data and changes in population dynamics.","Impact":"Inability to assess local transmission risks from case introductions accurately.","Mitigation":"Collect updated pre-control era prevalence data and consider recent population dynamics to define receptivity to imported cases.","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis technologies, demographic analysis tools.","People":"Public health authorities, researchers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, researchers."},{"Description":"Lack of travel histories in case data raising the possibility of infections acquired away from the location of residence.","Impact":"Inability to differentiate between likely local versus imported cases and assess the travel histories of imported cases.","Mitigation":"Integrate travel history data into case data collection and analysis to differentiate between local and imported cases.","Technologies":"Case data collection and analysis technologies.","People":"Public health authorities, researchers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, researchers."}]}
